text: This is a list of local government areas of The Gambia by Human Development Index as of 2019 with data for the year 2018. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! class="sort" |Rank ! class="sort" |LGA ! class="sort" |HDI (2018) ! class="unsortable" |Comparable countries (2018) |- ! colspan="4" style="color:#fc0;" |Medium human development |- |1 | style="text-align:left" |Banjul |0.557 | |- ! colspan="4" style="color:#900;" |Low human development |- |2 | style="text-align:left" |Kanifing |0.542 | |- |3 | style="text- align:left" |Brikama |0.499 | |- style="background:#e6e6e6" |– | style="text- align:left" | (average) |0.466 | |- |4 | style="text-align:left" |Mansakonko |0.433 |, |- |5 | style="text-align:left" |Kerewan |0.413 | |- |6 | style="text-align:left" |Janjanbureh |0.400 | |- |7 | style="text-align:left" |Basse |0.352 | |- |8 | style="text-align:left" |Kuntaur |0.332 | |- |} == References == Gambia Gambia Local government areas By Human Development Index
title: List of local government areas of the Gambia by Human Development Index
